input_text:
Job Title: Logistics Associate

Location: Hayward, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
WHO WE ARE:

EOS IT Management Solutions is a leading IT and Logistics company. We specialize in innovative IT logistics services. The organization has grown significantly over the past 5 years and has plans and strategies in place to continue to grow in a sustainable and profitable manner.

To deliver our business plans we want to add to our Logistics team and are currently seeking a candidate to fulfill the role of Logistics Coordinator.

THE POSITION

The Logistics Associate will be responsible for coordinating domestic and international shipments from our global warehousing hubs. The ideal candidate will be able to work under pressure, in a fast paced environment, with strong attention to detail. The ideal candidate will have a passion for logistics as well as strong customer service skills.

What You Will Do

End to end responsibility for outbound and inbound domestic and international shipments.Dispatching goods to global destinations.Requesting quotations from freight forwarders and partners.Booking shipments with carriers/freight forwardersBooking local deliveries, using EOS own trucks/vans and preferred suppliersCoordinating closely with Project Managers to identify deadlines, shipment durations, delivery requirementsWorking with Project Managers and customers to establish delivery requirementsRequesting and providing COI information as neededCreate trade documents, such as commercial invoice, including any consular, legislation or translation activities as per customer requirements.Work closely with the trade and compliance team to ensure export permits/licenses are in place to allow for the smooth export/import of goods where requiredTracking cost, variations and changes & report to management


What You Need To Succeed

Previous experience in Logistics ideally with experience in international shipments.Experience in assigning commodity codes of products.Working knowledge of Incoterms.Secondary or Higher Education.Pro-active and flexible with a can-do attitude and a willingness to learn.Organized, accurate and a strong attention to detail.Experience of working in a busy and diverse team environment.Good problem solver who works methodically, to tight deadlines within a pressurized environment.Strong commercial awareness and understandingGood inter-personal skills; able to communicate at all levels across the business and work closely within the team.


EOS is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We invite you to consider opportunities at EOS regardless of your gender; gender identity; gender reassignment; age; religious or similar philosophical belief; race; national origin; political opinion; sexual orientation; disability; marital or civil partnership status or other non-merit factor.

Pay Range

$68,000—$75,000 USD

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Logistics Associate
output_json.summary: EOS IT Management Solutions seeks a Logistics Coordinator with experience in international shipments, commodity codes, and Incoterms.
job_responsibilities: End-to-end responsibility for outbound and inbound shipments
Requesting quotations from freight forwarders and partners
Booking local deliveries using EOS own trucks/vans and preferred suppliers
Coordinating with Project Managers for deadlines, shipment durations, and delivery requirements
Working with Project Managers and customers to establish delivery requirements
Creating trade documents such as commercial invoices
Ensuring export permits/licenses are in place
output_json.company_information: EOS IT Management Solutions is a leading IT and Logistics company specializing in innovative IT logistics services.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: EOS is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.
